title: Somewhere with the Wind
description: Carson Chandler was lost and he didn't even know it. He was drowning his emotions on a path that had nowhere to go but down. That was until he met Claire, the girl that changed his life. Forever. But through unforeseen and unpredictable events, the hands of fate conspired to tear these lovers apart. Can Carson cope with the impending sense of loss? Will he revert to his former ways? Or will their love shine through the darkest moments and inspire him to persevere? Only time and fate can tell.
author: Austin Dewart
